#include<iostream>
#include<strings.h>
//#include<conio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		string s;
		cin>>s;
		//cout<<s[0]<<endl<<s[1]<<endl<<s[2]<<endl;
		int i,temp=0,count=0;
		for(i=0;i<10;i++)
		{
			temp=int(s[i]);
			//cout<<temp<<endl;
			if(temp==48)
			cout<<"-----";
			if(temp==49)
			{
				cout<<".----";
				count++;
			}
			if(temp==50)
			{
				cout<<"..---";
				count=count+2;
			}
			if(temp==51)
			{
				cout<<"...--";
				count=count+3;
			}
			if(temp==52)
			{
				count=count+4;
				cout<<"....-";
			}
			if(temp==53)
			{
				count=count+5;
				cout<<".....";
			}
			if(temp==54)
			{
                count=count+4;
				cout<<"-....";
			}
			if(temp==55)
			{
                count=count+3;
				cout<<"--...";
			}
			if(temp==56)
			{
                count=count+2;
				cout<<"---..";
			}
			if(temp==57)
			{
                count=count+1;
				cout<<"----.";
			}
		}
		cout<<endl;
		cout<<count<<endl;
    }
	//getch();
}
